item.title: Your first post
item.description:
Grom detect a subset of org-mode syntax.

This is a subheading

  • item

You can post images from the img/ directory using:

And grom fixes the size to the template and creates a link to the real size image. You can link an external resources, too. By now, you only can use jpeg files, but next versions of grom let add any image format to your blog. You can contact me to report any bug or suggestion.
